Articles.Content:
I feel bad for the people who were waiting on my mod.

I'm trying to make it again but...
Don't get attached.
I don't want to get you too hyped.

If you haven't seen the original, It's basically where Kerbin suspected to global warming.

So, no ice and a higher sea level?

Seems simple enough. I'll be waiting.
Looks nice defenetly keeping my eye on this!
